name: FMatheg
description: In FMatheg game you are going to solve 250 mathematical problems, there are 5 blocks and 50 problems in each block.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 270 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 270 MB available space
